Definition: A set of attributes developers can add to especially dynamic HTML elements to make content more accessible
Describes the kind of user interface element the HTML is describing (e.g., a button)
Category of ARIA role that represents an interactive component of the user interface
Describes a static or informative relationship between elements or a characteristic of it
Describes a dynamic property of an element. For example, a checkbox might be selected or not
This is a region of the page that can dynamically provide information about how a page is changing.
